news.title: 'They're weak': Israelis back conflict with Iran in neighbourhood struck by missile
news.summary: Bat Yam, just south of Tel Aviv, has long been a stronghold of support for Israel's right-wing governing coalition.

news.title: Trump told Netanyahu not to kill Iran's supreme leader, says report
news.summary: Trump told Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that assassinating Khamenei was not a good idea, according to CBS.

news.title: Watch: BBC at the site of Iranian attack in Israel
news.summary: The BBC's Middle East correspondent Hugo Bachega is in Petah Tikva, where an Iranian missile struck a building overnight.

news.title: Man and woman who died while skydiving in Devon named
news.summary: Belinda Taylor, 48, from Totnes, and Adam Harrison, 30, from Bournemouth, were killed, police say.

news.title: MI6 appoints first female chief in 116-year history
news.summary: Blaise Metreweli joined the Secret Intelligence Service (MI6) in 1999 and will become its 18th chief.

news.title: Man suspected of shooting Minnesota lawmakers arrested after huge manhunt
news.summary: Vance Luther Boelter is accused of killing Democrat Melissa Hortman and her husband Mark, and injuring two others.

news.title: Tory MP Patrick Spencer pleads not guilty to sexual assault charges
news.summary: He is accused of two attacks on two separate women in August 2023.

news.title: Investigators find cockpit voice recorder from crashed Air India flight
news.summary: The recovery of the recorder is a key step in uncovering what caused last week's deadly plane crash.

news.title: 'Shared ownership is a con and we felt trapped'
news.summary: Londoners, including couple Chris and Diana, share their experiences of shared ownership.

news.title: Father of Olympic champion Jakob Ingebrigtsen cleared of abusing his son
news.summary: Gjert Ingebrigtsen, the father and former trainer of Norwegian star Jakob Ingebrigtsen, is acquitted of abusing the two-time Olympic champion.
